official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to extend gratuitous wage credits to individuals who served in the United States Cadet Nurse Corps during World War II, and for other purposes.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to extend gratuitous wage credits to individuals who served in the U.S. Cadet Nurse Corps during World War II by treating them as World War II veterans. Makes this Act applicable to monthly benefits and lump-sum death payments payable after the enactment of this Act. Requires the Secretary of Health and Human Services to recompute the primary insurance amount for such individuals upon application by them or by any individual entitled to monthly benefits on the basis of their wages and self-employment income.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to extend gratuitous wage credits to individuals who served in the United States Cadet Nurse Corps during World War II, and for other purposes.
